answers.answer: You should definitely take time off my best friend just had a stillborn due to over working her self :( rest and relaxation is very important
If u have preeclampsia they might induce you
THANKS I WAS WOUNDRING BECAUSE ITS MY FIRST BBY SO IM NEW TO ALL THIS,AWW IM SOO SORRY TO HEAR THAT,THATS TERRIBLE THAT WOULD BE MY BIGGEST FEAR
WHAT,REALLY I HOPE NOT!TO ME ITZ WAY TO SOON I MEAN I KNOW THEY HAVE GOOD TECNOLOGY NOW ND DAYS BUT ITS NOT THE SAME

I have preeclampsia. I'm getting induced at 37 weeks, they only induce sooner if they NEED too. I just get monitored twice a week and get my blood drawn once a week. They just watch your pregnancy a lot closer and tell you too watch for the signs.
It would probably be a GOOD idea to take time off, you need to rest as much as possible.
OHH OKAY THANKS,IM THINKING BOUT ASKING MY DOC. ABOUT GETTING INDUCEED IF I HAVE TO
If you have it, usually they automatically induce you at 37 weeks!

question: I WENT TO THE E.R DUE TO BLEEDING FROM MY VAGINA N RECTUM,ME BEING 25 WEEKZ FRECKED ME N MY MAN OUT I WAS ALSO HAVIN A LOT OF CONTRACTIONS ND HAD TO GET FLUIDS INTO MY BODY BECUS I WAS VERY DEHYDROATED..DOES ANYONE ELSE HAVE THIS??DONT KNOW ANYOME WITH IT AND IM GOIN TO COLLEGE TO BE AN M.A SO THERES ALOT OF HANDS ON AND HAVIN TO BE UP ON MY FEET IM WOUNDERING IF I SHOULD TAKE TIME OFF OR JUST GO ALMOST UP TO  MY DUE DATE WHICH IS NOV.29
title: PRECLAMPSIA
